website_summaries.verdict: Pairs with PCs, Apple products, and more, and comes with adaptable sound sticks.
pros: Despite the post-modern design, customers report the speaker is easy to set up
We love the deep bass capabilities
Creates crisp sound that resonates in large areas, despite the speaker's compact size
cons: Not designed for movie theater-sized sound

website_summaries.verdict: The $170 SoundSticks III speakers offer light cosmetic upgrades (and unfortunately retain a few irritations) from the previous model, but if you're a fan of the iridescent design, this speaker system won't disappoint.
pros: The Harman Kardon SoundSticks III 2.1 speakers equip music lovers with four drivers in each satellite and a large subwoofer to pump extra bass
cons: There's no external jack for plugging in headphones, the bass controls are mounted on the subwoofer itself, and there's no way to turn off the translucent lighting without powering down the entire system

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Good Sounding, Poorly Designed Cables
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a modern set of speakers to snuggle up next to your iMac (or any other computer), you've found them. The sound is rich and even, with a very nice treble, adjustable bass, and good mids. My gripe, however, is the build quality of the cables and connections. The two satellite speakers are connected to the sub woofer by a plug that uses 4 prongs. These prongs are incredibly sensitive and susceptible to bend, which is exactly what happened to me. Since it was just over a year past the date I bought them, I'm pretty much out of luck now. This is a really big oversight and that plug is not very user-friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: 6 years now, and still going great
customer_reviews.text: It has been 6 years since I bought these speakers. They are still working great after 3-4 moves. They look really nice, except the occasional bug that falls into the subwoofer. ...once they are in, there's basically no way to remove the bug. Aside from that, everything works great, like the day I first bought these. The sound quality of these are okay. The bass is not overwhelming like other sound systems. This is somewhat tuned so that the sound won't overblow the speakers. Anyways, this is a good speaker system. Good for the price, and aesthetics.
customer_reviews.author: Nali

customer_reviews.title: No longer works at all after 23 months!
customer_reviews.text: Believe the many reviews that warn about these speakers dying in less than two years. Yes, the sound is quite good, but after 23 months my speakers no longer work at all. The warranty is 12 months, so after that you're out of luck. I didn't even bother contacting HK after reading other people's experience with them. Apparently they only offer a 20% discount on purchasing new speakers. Do yourself a favor and don't waste your money on these.
customer_reviews.author: FloridaDink

customer_reviews.title: Dead on Arrival... and Product help and return closed while on vacation
customer_reviews.text: Does not work... would not even power on right out of the box! I was out on a vacation after ordering these and when I got back hooked them up and NOTHING... Just as others have complained about however I didn't head their warnings. So due to my vacation and not getting back in time I guess the product support and return window have closed whatever this means... < Me screwed over! >
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: Almost ten years old and still rockin'
customer_reviews.text: Bought these early 2011. I listen to lots of jazz and classical. These speakers blow away every other set I've ever had. I still am amazed, even after all these years. I've been through three PCs and these have followed me through each one. They have survived three house moves. I would say the durability is excellent. I'm writing now, after all this time, because I want everyone to know that after ten years of enjoyment, for the price, I don't think you can get better.
customer_reviews.author: L. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Like other reviews
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviews, I have hit the period just out of the 1 year warranty and the speakers have developed a very annoying full-time buzz and crackling. I have spent hours experimenting with different things to eliminate the source, and it's the speakers. I have taken them to a room with no sound source, and they buzz and crackle immediately. If I insert a sound source, the music sounds good but as soon as I hit pause I'm left with crackling and a hum. I contacted Harman. Fell victim to the "no response" everyone else is getting. Unfortunately I bought two sets of these to use on different computers, and I believe both will eventually break.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen R.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound system - here is the best way to deal with that always on LED in the sub
customer_reviews.text: Great system with a clear sound and a nice base. The only negative is that the LED light does not turn off unless you unplug the entire system. The best way to deal with it is to plug it into one of these:  or for more convenience into one of these with a remote control so that you can turn off the system when its not in use:  (remote you can just velcro underneath your computer desk so that its a clean setup)
customer_reviews.author: Eugene K.

customer_reviews.title: WoW!!!
customer_reviews.text: Skeptical at first because plastic doesn't normally transmit good sound, but....damn!!! this system sounds great!! The tech manual is lacking good photos to hook it up, but once my daughter who is teck savvy hooked it up right, I can't believe how good it sounds!!! I would only change one thing, make the blue light red on the sub-woofer so it doesn't disrupt sleep melatonin. Harmon Kardon, has nailed it !!! Now just make the blue light red on the sub-woofer so we can sleep! I was so impressed with the sound, I bought 2 more systems for other rooms. You can't go wrong here at this price!!! Super impressed!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer newell

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality 100
customer_reviews.text: This speaker system has insane sound quality coming out of my PC, perfect for all my audiophile needs. It gets very loud and I never have to turn it up all the way to enjoy music/movies. I seriously can't stress enough, this thing sounds amazing. Only downfall, the bass volume control knob is on the back of the sub-woofer which is typically placed under ones desk or generally away from you main satellites. This makes adjusting it difficult, but that's kind of ok. You can simply set one level that most audio sources are fine at. I only have mine at about 50% and it's plenty of bass!
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: Defective Right Speaker
customer_reviews.text: The first item was defective, with loose wires in the right speaker. I had to wiggle them just so to get ANY sound out of it, so there's no way I'm keeping this item. I exchanged it for a different unit and will update my review accordingly, although there's no way I could in good conscience give these five stars under these circumstances (even if the replacement unit is flawless). But I will say that when the system was performing the way it should, its sound was incredibly detailed. It's going to take awhile to get used the touch sensitive volume buttons, though.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Heinrich

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING SOUND!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: For a 40W product, it sounds like a 200w one, and the bass is tight!!! I also notice the clarity of ALL instruments through the satellites !! You are hearing music through this unit as the musician intended them to sound. Great quality, very cool glass design, and easy to setup to my iMac. I am basking in the delightful sound of these amazing speakers! You would excpect to pay $300 plus for a sound as tight as this fir a computer speaker set....BLOWN AWAY!! Best computer speakers I have ever owned (I am 46 years old). I have tried Bose, JBL, Dell, Altec lansing, and sony, and these are TOP NOTCH!!!! LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.author: bryan betts

customer_reviews.title: some of them not so great for Harman Kardon
customer_reviews.text: Had the version before this. When my old Harman Kardon speakers died after 10 yrs, I needed to replace them. I read alot of reviews for alot of speakers, some of them not so great for Harman Kardon, but in the end decided to go with what I had before since I had such a good experience with them. And I have not been disappointed. Same crisp, clear sound with just the right amount of base.
customer_reviews.author: D. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sounding and beautiful looking speakers
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge stickler when it comes to the sound quality from desktop speakers. This system does NOT disappoint. It sounds and looks beautiful. It can definitely get loud, but more importantly, at reasonable volume levels, the sound is still crisp and the bass is tight and defined. The satellite speakers have a really cool heavy weighted bass too. I really am impressed by everything about these speakers. The ONLY thing that kind of bugs me is the "on" light that is ALWAYS lit on the subwoofer. At night, it's like a little night light under my desk. Not a huge issue, just kind of wish it didn't have it. I'd buy these speakers again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Disapointed
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in July 2019. Installed in late Sep 2019. Nice overall sound, but the volume is low. The look nice, but that's not why I buy speakers. Updating (Nov 2019): The volume control doesn't work. If I touch it, the speakers die. I have to unplug and replug, then they play again. Awesome sound when they work. I expected more from this brand. Update Dec 2019: lights are on, no sound. Just dead. What a waste of $$.
customer_reviews.author: Skibum

customer_reviews.title: A bit expensive, but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these speakers mostly for the look. They did NOT Disappoint. Sharp, Expensive, modern looking speakers. Surprisingly great sound, with deep full bass. It's a definitely recommendation. I added some pictures for you all to see with some leds.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound with a few quirks
customer_reviews.text: Sound is amazing as expected from HK. One word: EQUALIZER. If you're serious about sound you can make these soar but you have to use one whether from your phone or PC. My only two gripes but not quite deal breakers is the always on blue led in the sub. It will guide ships in to your house. So if you're using in bedroom and want it dark youll have to turn the system off. the other is the capacitive volume. it's dumb, gimmicky and very 2003.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZIN
customer_reviews.text: Quality items, the speakers have some weight to them and stand nicely on the weighted base. The cords are weaved and durable. Plenty of bass for a wooden home, clear sound, no major complaints. The only problem is how loud it can be when you unplug the jack from your computer if you swap between speakers and headphones a lot like I do. The feedback from the jack hitting the input hole or your finger can be very loud and trip the speakers and make them turn off until you unplug the power and plug it back in again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers for the price
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality isn't that of something from Bang & Olufsen but it's pretty good. I like them so much that I ordered a second set for another computer setup I have in my office. People talk about durability being poor but they feel pretty solid to me. Not sure what they're doing with their speakers but mine sit on my desk and the subwoofer is on a floor stand. If you like that Y2k aesthetic, order these! Also, they've been on the market since the early 2000s (iSub for that early iMac G3 in 2000) so they've been tried and tested. Anyway, with their iconic design and clear/loud sound quality... I really like them.
customer_reviews.author: maguzman

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, loud and awesome bass.
customer_reviews.text: I've only had these for a month, but so far they're incredible! I have these hooked up to my iMac and they're awesome. Way louder than anticipated with a great clarity and and a very impressive sub woofer that I keep on maybe half way. I've been thinking about buying these for the last 3 years, wish I would've pulled the trigger sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: Had the sticks II and it lasted for over 12 years. These so far 1 year in seems to be like the original in terms of durability. The sound is so clear, crisp and clean. I love them. Easy to install and work well with an IMAC comp. Would buy again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy66

customer_reviews.title: I was listening to music at a comfortable volume level
customer_reviews.text: Speakers stopped working within a week. I ordered a replacement and these speakers stopped working within a week as well. I was listening to music at a comfortable volume level; not loud at all. Serious design problems.
customer_reviews.author: deeaygo

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in less than 6 months
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Harman Kardon Soundsticks III system we've had. The first lasted almost 10 years and we loved it. When it "went", we figured it owed us nothing and bought the same brand to replace. This second set was ordered only 6 months ago and just stopped working earlier this week for no apparent reason. Maybe it is just a lemon, but now we'll have to deal with the warranty repair process which we expect to be difficult and inconvenient. We'd buy a different system but feel we should try to recover through the warranty as it was only in use for 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh :(
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish speaker system, but the sound quality is horrible and its bulky. I'm an audiophile and I would expect way more satisfying sound quality and some mid/low end from this price range. If this was a $30 sound system I would give it at least a 5- star BUT for the poor sound quality -1 star, bulky/sloppy/no wire management -1 star, high price -1 star = 2 STAR REVIEW
customer_reviews.author: Joseph E.

customer_reviews.title: They sound good, but mine did not last long:
customer_reviews.text: They sound pretty decent for their price point. However, I had them for about a year and a half with very light usage (most of my usage is on headphones) before they stopped turning on.
customer_reviews.author: Infaerina

customer_reviews.title: How can you hook this up to a TV?
customer_reviews.text: Just received this cool HK speaker set from my wife and we want to hook it up to our TV. Has anyone done this and if so what adapters will I need. I tried and I quickly realized it’s designed for computer use. I did hook it it to my iPhone and the sound was outstanding out of the box. Any help from Audiophiles would be greatly appreciated. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Laura J.

customer_reviews.title: Harmon Kardon Soundsticks are A+++
customer_reviews.text: Bought this HK speaker set not knowing much other than they looked cool. They also sound great! Volume control is hard to access my only complaint (it's hidden on one stick, or designed to blend into finish making hard to access). Otherwise, these Soundsticks are a nice choice: sound is crisp and loud. A+
customer_reviews.author: mojo1971

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and power
customer_reviews.text: This is the best portable speaker set-up I've ever had. I've gifted this to multiple friends. It is a plug in. No bluetooth. But it has really great sound (high end and bass bottom). It's loud. You wouldn't use it in a dancehall, but it's louder than you'll ever need in your place. Price-wise, it's the best you're going to get. These are better than many more expensive speakers I've bought.
customer_reviews.author: urbanyetti

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a art piece, sounds like an orchestra
customer_reviews.text: The look and sound of this system is beyond what I expected. The setup was fairly quick and easy and took approximately 7 minutes and we were listening to music in crisp clean sound with just the right amount of bass. Not having a remote is the only negative but it’s a computer system which probably wouldn’t need one, I’m using it as a home office system and it fills the room with the best sound quality. Great product, Excellent look.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Excellent looking and sounding
customer_reviews.text: My bf loves these but we are on our third set! I am a bit shocked that some small piece broke the first time on the right speaker and then this time one of the prong on the right-side speaker broke. It was hard to find just a one piece replacement so I now have two other subwoofers and cables in storage. That's a lot of money when added together. Not thrilled about that but he did not want to try something else.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade from JBL Creature Speakers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my aging JBL Creature Speakers. They were around 10 years old so Im sure technology has passed them by, I thought about getting new creature speakers because I love the look of them, but I decided on these and I am so glad I did. The sound is amazing. So much clearer and distinct than my old JBL's. With this, the words being sung are crisp and clear. The high and lows and brilliant. I hope these will last me for years to come
customer_reviews.author: Phillip D.

customer_reviews.title: The sound from these speakers is amazing clear and the volume level can get very loud
customer_reviews.text: I've had these speakers since 2011. The sound from these speakers is amazing clear and the volume level can get very loud. Very good for parties or hooking up to your tv. The best part though is they sound today just as good as they did back in 2011. With the way electronics die off or become obsolete after 1-2 years these days this is pleasant surprise. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Badsteak

customer_reviews.title: Most Know
customer_reviews.text: You most know, I've had these for a few years now, I edit video for a YouTube channel for kids so a lot of music and sound effects to be mixed. The sound quality specially the subwoofer is in my opinion the best for the price before going to really expensive professional speakers. If they work for me for work I'm pretty sure you'll be more than happy with it's performance for home use.
customer_reviews.author: J PELAEZ

customer_reviews.title: Harman Kardon is great, I just received a defective unit.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this dealer sent me this system with a blown bass speaker, I returned it and was quickly refunded. (just a side note, this isn't typical for a Harman Kardon product, they are the best of the best) also you should know that these are not Bluetooth, they must be hard connected to your phone, computer or TV
customer_reviews.author: KB2VYZ

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound that also looks great
customer_reviews.text: Great sound for the price. Not to mention the striking look. Matches very well with the look of my iMac. I tried to place the bass unit behind my 27" iMac but the bass just doesn't sound quite right. The mid-bass is still somewhat directional, and still sensitive to the placement. The iMac blocks some of them when sitting in front of the computer. I had to move it to the footwell under my large computer desk. It gives an instant boost to the base with good efficiency, if not a bit too boomy. The down-side is the striking look is now hidden underneath the desk, except for 2 sticks for the high's.
customer_reviews.author: hammer

customer_reviews.title: Cracks  2nd second did same as first!
customer_reviews.text: I love these speakers however the first set I got developed a crack in the woofer housing. It was replaced but now the 2nd set developed a crack as well. I think they are over tightening the leg screws as the crack developed from the leg and then spreads up into the base.
customer_reviews.author: yaacov137

customer_reviews.title: superior sound and function over creative labs.
customer_reviews.text: I was replacing a set of creative labs computer speakers as they decided for me to turn themselves off as a "green effort" to save electricity without my consent. I'm so glad they did, these are superior by far. Much crisper and better bass too. One customer on here put LED's behind the speakers and they look great! fooled several of us thinking they were stock. HK in your next version of these add the LED's!. I'll buy them! :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... me to give 100% (5) rating unless it is perfect. This system absolutely rocks but it is shy ...
customer_reviews.text: It's difficult for me to give 100% (5) rating unless it is perfect. This system absolutely rocks but it is shy of 100%. The satallite speakers produces crisp sounds and the volume control is sweet. The sub, however, produced booms which sounds more artificial than the sub for the home surround sound system. It lacks the strong and deep feel of a real home theater sub. For the price, it is absolutely an awesome system for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Sound great and beautiful; but poor customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the sound. And they are beautiful. Moving the speakers necessitated unplugging one which had small pins. Things worked well through two moves. Then one of the pins bent, and then broke. I tried to get it fixed; but I live in a remote area. So then, I asked if I could replace just the one speaker. They promised a response and to send me a replacement system (which I thought was overkill). Then, nothing happened. My additional attempts to rectify the situation met with no response. The speakers were great; but the service was horrible. Never again. I replaced them with the Logitech 200W THX system and I am quite pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Richard D. Travis

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Not quite perfect, but a very good sounding set of speakers for the cost. One hint, though. For a while I thought there was something wrong because the volume was so low. The silver capacitative buttons that serve as a volume control blend in almost too well with the sleek, reflective exterior.
customer_reviews.author: John A. Lay

customer_reviews.title: Awesome speakers, beautiful sound, but not a fan of the light it emits
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE these speakers! The only issue is that dang light that you can't turn off. I had to go in and manually cover the light to keep from lighting up the entire room at night. I followed the instructions from this video , and it worked well even though the video was talking about a different model. I just placed a black gaffers tape gently over the light and it has cut the brightness a ton. Harman Kardon - please keep this in mind as this seems to be a frequent complaint. The sound is great! But please give people the option to turn off the light. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: KPMT

customer_reviews.title: Really beautiful product but smaller than I expected when it was ...
customer_reviews.text: Really beautiful product but smaller than I expected when it was unboxed. Immediately connected it to my Audio Technica turntable and realized it didn't play very loud. I adjusted the sub volume where I liked it and started playing with the touch volume control on the tower speaker and it just didn't play loud enough. I connected it to my Note Edge and this did sound a little louder but in my opinion not enough to warrant keeping it. I sent it back for a refund and ordered directly from Harman Kardon their HKTS 200 for $199 and this is a much better system that not only sounds good but plays loud for larger rooms.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sorensen

customer_reviews.title: Diminished quality compared to older version.
customer_reviews.text: High frequencies are very tinny, and bass is overwhelming. Midrange is almost nonexistent. Could have definitely used a midrange speaker component. I had older 1st version and sound quality was much more balanced. Would NOT recommend. Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sassparilly

customer_reviews.title: What your money gets you...
customer_reviews.text: So, I knew my old $10 USB speakers were junk. And I've never owned a subwoofer before. That being said: HOLY MOLEY! I really really like these things. They arrived super quickly and in addition to being as pretty as you've always heard, they sound pretty darn good. I'm not a dedicated audiophile, so I don't know how to nitpick the tone or anything, but it's been forever since I've turned my music up this loud and enjoyed it this much. I feel like I just bought a bit of extra happiness.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Attractive addition...solid sound!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased overall. Wish one could have the power on with out the bright light glowing in the sub-woofer...but oh well. It is used in the kitchen, but if it was in a bedroom, it would be annoying having the light on 24/7 or needing to power it on and off all of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Letwin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing clarity and design!
customer_reviews.text: The sound is very crisp and clear. The design is beautiful. I hooked it up in ten minutes. I do like to "feel" the bass as with older speakers and subwoofers. I don't really want this subwoofer under anything...it's just too nice. I can hear a slight difference when turning up the bass which is also the on/off button. Overall, I love this product. It's not cheaply made either, another plus. I definitely recommend this for those that love the inner components of products. Very cool!
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Zone

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed with these speakers, they sound great, solid bass, good mids and highs, and the design is super modern. Setting up was easy and I'm considering buying a set for another room I like them so much.
customer_reviews.author: Tom A

customer_reviews.title: Bad product, so style, bad quality parts and assistances
customer_reviews.text: The product, its broke the power energy. In Brazil, i send to assistence, and return more broke, back with the sattelites speakers broken. Very sad. Beautiful, but ordinary product. I never buy more product brand Harman Kardon or JBL
customer_reviews.author: Victor Silva

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers, sound is great, rattles after a while
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for several years. They look great. There's a little LET in the sub so you don't trip over it at night. The sound is excellent and volume can go as loud as I like. My only complaint is that the side speakers started rattling at higher volumes after a few years because the clear case had a bit of play between the two halves. I fixed it with a rubber band around each speaker. The sound is perfect again, but the look of the speakers is less sharp with a rubber band around it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Harman Kardon Soundsticks III 2.1 Channel Multimedia Speaker System with Subwoofer feedback
customer_reviews.text: I completely forgot to read the small manual on the button control from the subwoofer to know that when pressing it the power can be turned on and off from there. I love the sound it gives me and find it hard to replace with another low priced item.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: When I unpacked them I liked the way they looked and they were easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research and read a lot of reviews about these speakers. I was skeptical about them being so small. When I unpacked them I liked the way they looked and they were easy to install. What was more amazing was how they sound. They sound like the music is live. They have a lot of volume and are very clear. The sub has a lot of bass and is clear. For the price I don't think you could buy speakers any better. They take up very little room on my desktop and are a conversation piece. Try them I think you will like them.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: I was greatly surprised at how good they sounded
customer_reviews.text: I connected these to the audio output of a Marantz HD-DAC1 headphone amp, D/A converter and played DSD and FLAC files from my computer through them. I was greatly surprised at how good they sounded. I connected them to the output of the computers Creative Sound Blaster Recon3D PCIe audio out and played FLAC files and the sound quality dropped sharply. How good these sound will depend greatly on the quality of the D/A converter in your computer, (garbage in garbage out) but they are capable of great sound for the money.
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: In my personal person when I was in college I worked for a company that made parts for Harmon and Bose and I can tell you Harmon
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are just what I needed. In my personal person when I was in college I worked for a company that made parts for Harmon and Bose and I can tell you Harmon is a far better and higher quality piece of equipment. They pay for their quality. The speakers have clarity that is unmatched by Bose and the base is great. Also when the light is off these speakers light up the globe. I own a sales office and bought these for my entire staff they love them and they are a great conversation starter as well.
customer_reviews.author: Earl Little

customer_reviews.title: Extremely low quality
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was a great product until it decided to stop working after 6 months of use. The speakers won't go above a very low level. They have become very fuzzy. Almost as if the speaker has popped when nothing improper has been done to it. Extremely unhappy to have a speaker this expensive becomes useless. If it can be replaced I will update this review. I would not recommend this buy if you do not want to change your speaker for at least a year.
customer_reviews.author: Sky

customer_reviews.title: No Sound after 3 months of use.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for 3 months with a brand new alienware computer without any incident. I do not play music very loud or for long periods of time. However when I moved my PC from the table to the floor, disconnecting all cables and then reconnecting, I was unable to receive any sound from this speaker. I am tech savvy so connecting a speaker is not a big problem at all.
customer_reviews.author: Tfun

customer_reviews.title: Second pair of HK Soundsticks
customer_reviews.text: Liked the first model of Harmon/Kardon Soundsticks. So, I gave these a try. Cosmetically, black accents and silver cables are nicer than blue and beige cables on the first model. I think the sound is exactly the same. I have them on either side of my computer so the sound is really only for me, they don't fill up the room but I suppose they could if they were spread apart to give a larger field of sound. I like that they have essentially remained the same all these years and so has the price point, nothing amazing but good enough for music and movies while you work. Tilting them up makes a huge difference in the treble.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful in sound and looks.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a week now and I love it. The sound is beautiful. It is just cool looking as well. I have never wanted a base that shakes my wall, but the base through the sub-woofer is rich and apparent without rattling my teeth. The Soundsticks are the stars however. Their sound is bright and beautiful. Best computer speakers I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Hammit

customer_reviews.title: These things are great. Everyone comments on the look
customer_reviews.text: These things are great. Everyone comments on the look. customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound, good value
customer_reviews.text: Not a bargain-priced unit, but it delivers good clean sound from a wide range of sources. The installation guide says to put the sub under a desk, but I find that it sounds fine on the top of my desk hidden behind the monitor. The only performance shortcoming is maybe a bit of weakness in the midrange, but the bass and highs are excellent. The volume/mute control is a bit awkward to manipulate, so I usually use the PC to control the volume. Strongly recommend this unit if you are looking for high-quality sound from your PC for watching movies.

I run my AAC sound through a good external DAC (Schiit Fulla) so it's not the source material. Opaque plastic computer speakers can patch the weakness of the enclosure material with insulation. product_meta.title: Harman Kardon SoundSticks III 2.1 Speaker System
product_meta.description:
A 6-inch, 20-watt downward-firing powered subwoofer. Eight 1-inch full-range transducers. Plug-and-play compatibility with virtually any multimedia device. And stunning industrial design that perfectly matches the clarity of the sound. The Harman Kardon SoundSticks III desktop sound system brings a new level of excitement to music, games and movies with a minimum of wiring and looks spectacular doing it.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


LISTEN TO A WORK OF ART.
Praised for its stunning design, the harman kardon® SoundSticks II speakers and subwoofer system became a milestone in harman kardon history when it became part of the permanent collection at New York City's Museum of Modern Art (MoMA). Improving on its famous sibling's pop-culture appeal, the SoundSticks III system is all that and much more. As a three-piece, 2.1-channel multimedia sound system, SoundSticks III brings a new level of excitement to music, games and movies to your home - with its exceptional sound clarity, enhanced color scheme and bare minimum of wiring. Beyond its eye-catching appeal, SoundSticks III continues to be incredibly capable - with 40 watts of dazzling amplification, a down-firing powered subwoofer, eight full-range transducers and compatibility with all sorts of multimedia devices. As the sublime sequel to a prized performer, SoundSticks III is performance art at its finest. 


Stunning Sound. Stunning Looks. THE HARMAN KARDON® SOUNDSTICKS III - AT A GLANCE.
Four, 1" full-range transducers per channel powered by a 10-watt amplifier for room-filling sound One, 6" low-frequency transducer powered by a 20-watt amplifier for outstanding bass performance Compatible with all devices with a stereo mini-jack output Touch volume and mute controls Subwoofer volume control Angle-adjustable satellites Incredible industrial design 

The full-range transducers fill the room with accurate, detailed sound quality Click here to View Larger HIGHLIGHTS.
FILL THE ROOM WITH EIGHT FULL-RANGE TRANSDUCERS
The harman kardon brand has a rich history of engineering sound with highly regarded results. The SoundSticks III system is no different. Powered by a total of 20-watts, eight full-range transducers (four in each speaker) deftly fill your room with great sound, while increasing power handling and audio output. With less distortion and better sound quality, SoundSticks III speakers ensure that you'll hear music or video exactly the way the composer intended.


A powerful 20-watt woofer delivers deep, accurate bass from whatever you happen to be listenting to Click here to View Larger DOWN-FIRING SUBWOOFER WITH VOLUME CONTROL
For a true audiophile listening experience, the SoundSticks III system also features a six-inch down-firing subwoofer with volume control that is powered by a 20-watt amplifier. By aiming sound down instead of at surrounding walls, your subwoofer makes your system less susceptible to adverse room variables - giving you a consistent performance. The subwoofer also has a flared port that reduces port noise during high-volume passages. This feature helps you tailor sound levels based on your room's specifications as well as your own listening preferences.

CONNECT TO VIRTUALLY ANY MEDIA DEVICE
Other than its stunning good looks, the SoundSticks III system offers excellent compatibility with other audio components. Thanks to its 3.5mm stereo audio connection, SoundSticks III speakers can be used with MP3 players, portable CD players, computers and almost anything with stereo line-level outputs. By offering you this user-friendly option, SoundSticks III becomes a nimble addition to your desktop, bookshelf or entertainment center, keeping your life simple with a maximum of connection options - and a bare minimum of wiring.


Touch controls offer elegant ease of use TOUCH CONTROLS FOR VOLUME AND MUTE
The SoundSticks III system makes it easy for you to interact with your subwoofer and "sticks," offering sensitive touch controls for raising, lowering or muting the system volume. By responding to the gentle touch of your fingertip, this intuitive design feature makes your SoundSticks III system easy to operate, and keeps this work of audio "art" in the best possible condition. 


The Soundsticks III satellites angle to nearly any direction for the best possible sound CONTROL THE ANGLE OF YOUR SATELLITE SPEAKERS
Elegant and easy to use, SoundSticks III satellite speakers are designed to fit exactly where you want them - and maybe even in a few other places. As a modern design feature that's adaptable to your environment, the SoundSticks III system has two angle-adjustable satellite speakers that bend from low angle to high. Gently push or pull each satellite to the desired position - and you can optimize the angle at which sound enters, and fills, the room around you. 

ATTRACTIVE, HIGH-QUALITY AUDIO CABLES
Some manufacturers make audio cables a bare-minimum expense, which can compromise the integrity of an audio product and, potentially, the look of it. The SoundSticks III system does no such thing. SoundSticks III audio cables match the high-quality, transparent modern design of the speakers in terms of quality and visual appeal - and live just underneath the transparent speaker covers as if being showcased. Kept in place by black connection beads, these premium audio cables ensure that audio travels from source to speaker, without any sign of degradation or outside interference. Their flexible design gives you the freedom to use the Soundsticks III with other devices that use an analog output such as games consoles, DVD/Blu-ray Disc players, and TVs. And since they are detachable, they can be easily replaced if they happened to get damaged. 

A SOUND PLAN FOR ENERGY-EFFICIENCY
The SoundSticks III speaker system is soundly engineered for full compliance with the most demanding energy-efficiency requirements. It achieves this "green" standard primarily through incorporating a convenient on/off switch, which is built into the subwoofer volume control. This way, you gain more power over your power usage while keeping your satisfaction levels high and your energy bill low. 

INSPIRING INDUSTRIAL DESIGN
Few multimedia sound systems can boast that their predecessor was part of the permanent collection at New York City's Museum of Modern Art (MoMA), but that's exactly the claim the SoundSticks III speaker system can make. Taking its older sibling's celebrated design even further, the SoundSticks III look is cutting-edge with a modern industrial design aesthetic, elegant black accents and a luminescent white LED glow. And though the SoundSticks III system may look like a visitor from the future with its transparent speaker covers, its exceptional performance makes it a more-than-worthy encore to its pop-culture predecessor. 


For more than 50 years harman kardon products have delivered great sound and extraordinary design DESIGNED TO ENTERTAIN.
For more than 50 years, harman kardon® audio experts have - through extraordinary industrial design, innovative technologies and meticulous engineering - created products to deliver the ultimate listening experience. From the world's very first high-fidelity receiver in 1954 to high-current, ultrawide-bandwidth amplifier design (still used today) to high-performance multimedia speakers that look as good as they sound, the harman kardon brand has led the way to the finest audio and video quality possible. With a complete package of performance, design, flexibility and ease of use, harman kardon products are perfect for all the sounds and visuals that modern, high-definition digital content has to offer. So treat yourself to the ultimate at-home listening experience - one that only a harman kardon system can provide.
